The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\julia\\OneDrive\\Dokument\\JS.serviceRawFile:
service: quiztopia

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: eu-north-1
  environment:
    QUIZZES_TABLE: QuizzesTable
    USERS_TABLE: UsersTable
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET}

# Definiera en IAM-roll med nödvändiga behörigheter
iamRoleStatements:
  - Effect: Allow
    Action:
      - dynamodb:PutItem
      - dynamodb:GetItem
      - dynamodb:Scan
      - dynamodb:DeleteItem
      - dynamodb:UpdateItem
    Resource:
      - arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/QuizzesTable
      - arn:aws:dynamodb:${self:provider.region}:*:table/UsersTable

functions:
  signup:
    handler: auth.signup
    events:
      - http:
          path: auth/signup
          method: post
  login:
    handler: auth.login
    events:
      - http:
          path: auth/login
          method: post
  getQuizzes:
    handler: quiz.getQuizzes
    events:
      - http:
          path: quiz
          method: get
  createQuiz:
    handler: quiz.createQuiz
    events:
      - http:
          path: quiz
          method: post
  addQuestion:
    handler: quiz.addQuestion
    events:
      - http:
          path: quiz/question
          method: post
  getQuiz:
    handler: quiz.getQuiz
    events:
      - http:
          path: quiz/{quizId}
          method: get
      - http:
          path: quiz/user/{userId}/{quizId}
          method: get
  deleteQuiz:
    handler: quiz.deleteQuiz
    events:
      - http:
          path: quiz/{quizId}
          method: delete

resources:
  Resources:
    QuizzesTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: QuizzesTable
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: quizId
            AttributeType: S
          - AttributeName: userId
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: quizId
            KeyType: HASH
          - AttributeName: userId
            KeyType: RANGE
        ProvisionedThroughput:
          ReadCapacityUnits: 5
          WriteCapacityUnits: 5

    UsersTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: UsersTable
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: username
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: username
            KeyType: HASH
        ProvisionedThroughput:
          ReadCapacityUnits: 5
          WriteCapacityUnits: 5

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
  - serverless-dotenv-plugin
